product_name: Igloo Yukon Cold Locker Cooler - 70 qt.
long_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 70 qt. Igloo Yukon Cold Locker cooler. It has room for food and drinks, and it stand ups to abuse that comes with your adventurous lifestyle.
short_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 70 qt. Igloo Yukon Cold Locker cooler. It has room for food and drinks, and it stand ups to abuse that comes with your adventurous lifestyle.
